instruction.instruction_text: Start facing the window with cabinets below it. Turn left, keeping the cabinet unit with a wine rack on your right. Walk straight past the large built-in cabinet unit on your left and a living room entrance on your right. Then, turn left and go through the open doorway, stopping at its threshold facing the outdoor grassy area.

Turn left, facing the long room that contains a dining table. Walk straight into this room, keeping the wall with a picture on your left and a long set of cabinets on your right. Continue forward until you pass the dining table on your left and the cabinets on your right end near a window. Then, turn right and enter the doorway directly in front of you. Stop in front of the kitchen cabinets on your right.

Turn left and walk forward, keeping the large TV on your right. Continue straight into the hallway, passing an open doorway on your left. Proceed straight down the hallway. Enter the living room on your right, with an outdoor view visible on your left. Turn right and stop in front of the coffee table, facing the sofa.

Turn right, passing the hanging chair on your right, and enter the dining room. Walk straight through the dining room, keeping the dining table on your left and the kitchen cabinets with a window on your right. Continue straight until you enter the living room. Walk straight through the living room, keeping the large couch on your left and the TV display on your right. Stop at the entrance of the outdoor patio.
Turn right to go through the doorway. Walk forward into the dining area, keeping the dining table on your left, and stop in front of the window.

Walk straight forward into the dining area, passing the dining table on your left and the kitchen cabinets on your right. Turn left to face the open doorway. Enter the doorway and walk straight into the small kitchen area. Stop in front of the counter with the sink and cooking area on your left.

Turn around and walk forward in the hallway, passing a room with shelves on your right. Continue straight down the hallway, passing a bedroom on your right. When you reach the window in front of you at the end of the hallway, turn right to enter the bathroom. Walk past the toilet on your left and the sink vanity on your right, then turn right again and enter the shower stall, stopping in front of the window.

Walk into the hallway, passing the living room on your left and an open space on your right. Continue straight down the hallway, passing an opening with shelves on your right. As you approach the end of the hallway with a window directly ahead, turn left to enter the bedroom. Stop in front of the bed, facing the window.

Walk forward through the dining area, keeping the large painting on your left and built-in cabinets on your right. Continue past the dining table with chairs on your right. Turn right to enter the next room, then walk straight ahead into the kitchen. Stop in front of the sink, directly under the window on your left.

Enter the living room. With a large ottoman on your right, turn left to face the television and its media console. Walk straight forward towards the television. Stop in front of the television and the media console.
